bad move of black, it blocks his bishop on the black line.
Nc6 would have been better.
I don't mind getting more control in the center, therefore I push my pawn forward to d4.
ow how cute he attacks my knight.
well I don't want to be forced to strike back with the g-pawn so I move my pawn to d5 to prevent it from being taken.

well I didn't expect this trade so soon, but my queen is now active and I'll leave it standing here untill I find the need to move it again.
It is in no danger of being attacked on the first 3 moves.

thankfully my knight was also protecting b5.
after this move black never got a chance to avoid checkmate.
check with both my knight and my bisschop so he has to move his king.
